name: 开路先锋S:Open Road First Front S
name_original: 开路先锋S:Open Road First Front S
description:
What kind of game is it?

At present, it is a mecha black iron style jump all the way through the game, there is a lot of content to update, when the author has enough technical ability, the author will make a major update.
Add AI, damage, maps, weapons, equipment, mechs, etc., and make them updated towards the final destination.

Will there be multiplayer?

According to the author's technology, it can only be played by single player at present, of course, the author is studying in multiplayer mode. Update LAN online soon.
Of course, it's better to be alone than to be with others. That's a problem.

What is the maximum discount for this game?

If it wasn't 40%off the first time, I'd just comminuted the fracture.

What if I want a refund?


According to the Refund rules of Steam, you can ask the customer service to tell you the situation and get a refund if you stay in the storage for six days and play time is less than two hours.

The author comments


Man is doing, god is watching. Do what you have to do. In the face of a strong wind. Don't give up, open back. For mainland China! Never give up!
